Literature.Title: New small-size peptides possessing antifungal activity.
Literature.Author: Garibotto FM, et al.

Literature.Title: Penetratin and derivatives acting as antibacterial agents.

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Candida albicans ATCC 10231(60-70% Inhibition=200µM),Candida albicans ATCC 10231(40-50% Inhibition=100µM),Cryptococcus neoformans ATCC 32264(70-80% Inhibition=200µM),Cryptococcus neoformans ATCC 32264(10-20% Inhibition=100µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 29213(MIC=>50µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 43300(MIC=>50µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=>50µM),Escherichia coli(MIC=>50µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=>50µM),Yersinia enterocolitica(MIC=>50µM),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Enteritidis(MIC=>50µM),Salmonella sp.(MIC=>50µM)
